raw_body: WIDYALANKARA,​ ANULA – Beloved wife of late Rufus,​ much loved mother of Rukshan and Enoka,​ mother-in-law of Samali and Paveen Weerasinha,​ precious grandmother of Pahan and William Eklund (Sweden),​ Sandalu,​ Dinal and Rahul. Cortege leaves residence No.40,​ Ramya Mawatha,​ Sri Subhuthipura,​ Battaramulla on 4th January for Cremation at 5 p.m. at Battaramulla Cemetery.000968
